de.javasoft.swing.jytable.renderer
Class TableHeaderCellProvider

java.lang.Object
  org.jdesktop.swingx.renderer.ComponentProvider<JYTableHeaderCell>
      de.javasoft.swing.jytable.renderer.TableHeaderCellProvider
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, org.jdesktop.swingx.plaf.UIDependent
Direct Known Subclasses:
SyntheticaJYTableHeaderUI.SyntheticaProvider
public class TableHeaderCellProvider
extends org.jdesktop.swingx.renderer.ComponentProvider<JYTableHeaderCell>

An implementation of ComponentProvider which provides a configured JYTableHeaderCell as rendering component. The provider itself is configurable with the properties of a CellLayoutHints and guarantees to configure the headerCell.

See Also:
